description.value:
Activate 1 (manipulate)

This dust is created from the powdered bones of ensnared rabbits and other woodland creatures that died from fright. When inhaled, it pollutes the victim's mind with fear, awakening an unshakable prey response that sees danger lurking in every shadow.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:28]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}, and can't reduce frightened value for 1 round (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}, and can't reduce frightened value for 1 round (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage, frightened 2, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] the poison cloud for 1 round, and can't reduce frightened value for 1 round (1 round)
